query.name: dsCheckLogin
query.sql: select ua.*, ua.AUTHMETHOD, e.firstname, e.middlename, e.lastname, e.DEPARTMENTID, e.PHONE1, e.EMAIL, u.OBJECTTYPE from CORE_USERACCOUNT ua left join CORE_USER u on (ua.userid = u.userid) left join DEP_EMPLOYEE e on (e.employeeid = u.objectid) where ua.login=#bind($username) and (1=2 #chunk($passwordSha) or (ua.password = #bind($passwordSha)) #end #chunk($passwordSha512) or (ua.password = #bind($passwordSha512)) #end #chunk($passwordSha512salt) or (ua.password = #bind($passwordSha512salt)) #end ) and ua.STATUS='ACTIVE'

query.name: dsUserAccountGetInfoById
query.sql: select ua.*, ua.AUTHMETHOD, e.FIRSTNAME, e.MIDDLENAME, e.LASTNAME, e.DEPARTMENTID, e.POSITION, e.PHONE1, e.EMAIL, d.DEPTSHORTNAME, d.DEPTFULLNAME, d.DEPTCODE, u.OBJECTTYPE from CORE_USERACCOUNT ua left join CORE_USER u on (ua.userid = u.userid) left join DEP_EMPLOYEE e on (e.employeeid = u.objectid) left join DEP_DEPARTMENT d on (e.DEPARTMENTID = d.DEPARTMENTID) where ua.useraccountid=#bind($useraccountid)

query.name: dsUserAccountGetInfoByLogin
query.sql: select ua.*, ua.AUTHMETHOD, ua.USERACCOUNTID, e.FIRSTNAME, e.MIDDLENAME, e.LASTNAME, e.DEPARTMENTID, e.POSITION, e.PHONE1, e.EMAIL, d.DEPTSHORTNAME, d.DEPTFULLNAME, d.DEPTCODE, u.OBJECTTYPE from CORE_USERACCOUNT ua left join CORE_USER u on (ua.userid = u.userid) left join DEP_EMPLOYEE e on (e.employeeid = u.objectid) left join DEP_DEPARTMENT d on (e.DEPARTMENTID = d.DEPARTMENTID) where ua.login=#bind($login)

query.name: dsMenuBrowseListByParam
query.sql: SELECT #result('T.MENUID', 'java.lang.Long', 'MENUID'), #result('T.NAME', 'java.lang.String', 'ITEMNAME'), #result('T.SYSNAME', 'java.lang.String', 'ITEMSYSNAME'), #result('T.ACTIONURL', 'java.lang.String', 'URL'), #result('T.PICTUREURL', 'java.lang.String', 'IMG'), #result('T.PRODCONFIGID', 'java.lang.Long', 'PRODCONFIGID'), #result('T.MENUTYPEID', 'java.lang.String', 'MENUTYPEID'), #result('T.PARENTMENUID', 'java.lang.Long', 'PARENTMENUID'), #result('T3.NAME', 'java.lang.String', 'TYPENAME'), #result('T3.SYSNAME', 'java.lang.String', 'TYPESYSNAME'), #result('T.POSITION', 'java.lang.Long', 'POSITION'), #result('T.JOURNALID', 'java.lang.Long', 'JOURNALID'), #result('LEVEL', 'java.lang.Long', 'LEVEL') $ASPECTFIELDS FROM B2B_MENU T INNER JOIN B2B_MENUTYPE T3 ON (T.MENUTYPEID = T3.MENUTYPEID) $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($NAME) T.NAME = #bind($NAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($SYSNAME) T.SYSNAME = #bind($SYSNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($PRODCONFIGID) T.PRODCONFIGID = #bind($PRODCONFIGID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end START WITH T.PARENTMENUID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR T.MENUID = T.PARENTMENUID ORDER SIBLINGS BY T.POSITION

query.name: dsMenuBrowseListByParamCount
query.sql: SELECT #result('COUNT($NEEDDISTINCT T.MENUID)', 'java.lang.Long', 'CNT') $ASPECTFIELDS FROM B2B_MENU T INNER JOIN B2B_MENUORGSTRUCT T2 ON (T.MENUID = T2.MENUID) INNER JOIN B2B_MENUTYPE T3 ON (T.MENUTYPEID = T3.MENUTYPEID) $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($NAME) T.NAME = #bind($NAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($SYSNAME) T.SYSNAME = #bind($SYSNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($PRODCONFIGID) T.PRODCONFIGID = #bind($PRODCONFIGID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

query.name: dsGetContractsStateDate
query.sql: SELECT #result('DEPARTMENT.DEPARTMENTID', 'java.lang.Long','DEPARTMENTID'), #result('CONTRACT.CONTRID', 'java.lang.Long','CONTRID'), #result('CONTRACT.SELLERID', 'java.lang.Long','SELLERID'), #result('DEPEMPLOYEE.EMAIL', 'java.lang.String','EMAIL'), #result('CONTRACTSTATENAME.SYSNAME', 'java.lang.String','CONTRACTSYSNAME'), #result('CONTRACTSTATENAME.PUBLICNAME', 'java.lang.String','CONTRACTSTATEPUBLICNAME'), #result('CONTRACTSTATE.STARTDATE', 'java.math.BigDecimal','CONTRACTDATE'), #result('CONTRACT.STARTDATE', 'java.math.BigDecimal','CONTRACTSTARTDATE'), #result('CONTRACT.CONTRNUMBER', 'java.lang.String','CONTRNUMBER') $ASPECTFIELDS FROM INS_CONTR CONTRACT LEFT JOIN INS_OBJSTATE CONTRACTSTATE ON CONTRACTSTATE.STATEID = CONTRACT.STATEID AND CONTRACTSTATE.OBJID = CONTRACT.CONTRID LEFT JOIN CORE_SM_STATE CONTRACTSTATENAME ON CONTRACTSTATENAME.ID = CONTRACT.STATEID INNER JOIN INS_EMPSELLER EMPSELLER ON EMPSELLER.SELLERID = CONTRACT.SELLERID INNER JOIN DEP_EMPLOYEE DEPEMPLOYEE ON DEPEMPLOYEE.EMPLOYEEID = EMPSELLER.EMPLOYEEID INNER JOIN DEP_DEPARTMENT DEPARTMENT ON DEPEMPLOYEE.DEPARTMENTID = DEPARTMENT.DEPARTMENTID $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($CONTRACTSYSNAME) CONTRACTSTATENAME.SYSNAME in (#bind($CONTRACTSYSNAME 'VARCHAR')) #end #chunk($CONTRACTDATE) CONTRACTSTATE.STARTDATE < #bind($CONTRACTDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($STATEDATEBEGIN) CONTRACTSTATE.STARTDATE >= #bind($STATEDATEBEGIN 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($STATEDATEEND) CONTRACTSTATE.STARTDATE <= #bind($STATEDATEEND 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($PRODVERID) CONTRACT.PRODVERID = #bind($PRODVERID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CONTRACTID) CONTRACT.CONTRID = #bind($CONTRACTID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

query.name: dsGetContractsStateDateCount
query.sql: SELECT #result('COUNT(CONTRACT.CONTRID)', 'java.lang.Long', 'CNT') FROM INS_CONTR CONTRACT LEFT JOIN INS_OBJSTATE CONTRACTSTATE ON CONTRACTSTATE.STATEID = CONTRACT.STATEID AND CONTRACTSTATE.OBJID = CONTRACT.CONTRID LEFT JOIN CORE_SM_STATE CONTRACTSTATENAME ON CONTRACTSTATENAME.ID = CONTRACT.STATEID INNER JOIN INS_EMPSELLER EMPSELLER ON EMPSELLER.SELLERID = CONTRACT.SELLERID INNER JOIN DEP_EMPLOYEE DEPEMPLOYEE ON DEPEMPLOYEE.EMPLOYEEID = EMPSELLER.EMPLOYEEID INNER JOIN DEP_DEPARTMENT DEPARTMENT ON DEPEMPLOYEE.DEPARTMENTID = DEPARTMENT.DEPARTMENTID $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($CONTRACTSYSNAME) CONTRACTSTATENAME.SYSNAME in (#bind($CONTRACTSYSNAME 'VARCHAR')) #end #chunk($CONTRACTDATE) CONTRACTSTATE.STARTDATE < #bind($CONTRACTDATE 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($STATEDATEBEGIN) CONTRACTSTATE.STARTDATE >= #bind($STATEDATEBEGIN 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($STATEDATEEND) CONTRACTSTATE.STARTDATE <= #bind($STATEDATEEND 'FLOAT') #end #chunk($PRODVERID) CONTRACT.PRODVERID = #bind($PRODVERID 'NUMERIC') #end #chunk($CONTRACTID) CONTRACT.CONTRID = #bind($CONTRACTID 'NUMERIC') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

query.name: dsB2BGetContractsState
query.sql: SELECT #result('CONTRACT.CONTRID', 'java.lang.Long','CONTRID'), #result('CONTRACTSTATENAME.SYSNAME', 'java.lang.String','STATESYSNAME'), #result('CONTRACTSTATENAME.PUBLICNAME', 'java.lang.String','STATENAME'), #result('CONTRACTSTATE.STARTDATE', 'java.math.BigDecimal','STATEDATE'), #result('CONTRACT.SIGNDATE', 'java.math.BigDecimal','SIGNDATE'), #result('CONTRACT.CONTRNUMBER', 'java.lang.String','CONTRNUMBER') FROM B2B_CONTR CONTRACT LEFT JOIN INS_OBJSTATE CONTRACTSTATE ON CONTRACTSTATE.STATEID = CONTRACT.STATEID AND CONTRACTSTATE.OBJID = CONTRACT.CONTRID #chunk($CONTRID) AND CONTRACT.CONTRID = #bind($CONTRID 'NUMERIC') #end LEFT JOIN CORE_SM_STATE CONTRACTSTATENAME ON CONTRACTSTATENAME.ID = CONTRACT.STATEID #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($CONTRID) CONTRACT.CONTRID = #bind($CONTRID 'NUMERIC') #end #end

query.name: dsB2BGetContractsStateCount
query.sql: SELECT #result('COUNT(CONTRACT.CONTRID)', 'java.lang.Long', 'CNT') FROM B2B_CONTR CONTRACT LEFT JOIN INS_OBJSTATE CONTRACTSTATE ON CONTRACTSTATE.STATEID = CONTRACT.STATEID AND CONTRACTSTATE.OBJID = CONTRACT.CONTRID LEFT JOIN CORE_SM_STATE CONTRACTSTATENAME ON CONTRACTSTATENAME.ID = CONTRACT.STATEID #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($CONTRID) CONTRACT.CONTRID = #bind($CONTRID 'NUMERIC') #end #end

query.name: dsKladrBrowseListByParam
query.sql: select distinct T.KLADROBJID KLADROBJID, T2.CODE REGIONCODE, T2.FULLNAME REGIONNAME, T2.FULLNAME || ' ' || T2.SHORTNAME REGIONFULLNAME, T2.SHORTNAME REGIONTYPE, T6.TYPECODE REGIONTYPECODE, (case when substr(T3.CODE, 3, 3) = '000' then '' else T3.CODE end) ZONECODE, (case when substr(T3.CODE, 3, 3) = '000' then '' else T3.FULLNAME end) ZONENAME, (case when substr(T3.CODE, 3, 3) = '000' then '' else T3.FULLNAME || ' ' || T3.SHORTNAME end) ZONEFULLNAME, T3.SHORTNAME ZONETYPE, T7.TYPECODE ZONETYPECODE, (case when substr(T4.CODE, 6, 3) = '000' then '' else T4.CODE end) CITYCODE, (case when substr(T4.CODE, 6, 3) = '000' then '' else T4.FULLNAME end) CITYNAME, (case when substr(T4.CODE, 6, 3) = '000' then '' else T4.FULLNAME || ' ' || T4.SHORTNAME end) CITYFULLNAME, T4.SHORTNAME CITYTYPE, T8.TYPECODE CITYTYPECODE, (case when substr(T5.CODE, 9, 3) = '000' then '' else T5.CODE end) PLACECODE, (case when substr(T5.CODE, 9, 3) = '000' then '' else T5.FULLNAME end) PLACENAME, (case when substr(T5.CODE, 9, 3) = '000' then '' else T5.FULLNAME || ' ' || T5.SHORTNAME end) PLACEFULLNAME, (case when substr(T5.CODE, 9, 3) = '000' then 'ААА' else T5.FULLNAME || ' ' || T5.SHORTNAME end) PLACEORDERNAME, T5.SHORTNAME PLACETYPE, T9.TYPECODE PLACETYPECODE, T.CODE, T.POSTALCODE, T.FULLNAME NAME, T.FULLNAME || ' ' || T.SHORTNAME FULLNAME, T.SHORTNAME TYPE, T.ISFEDERALCITY ISFEDERALCITY, T.ISNOSTREET ISNOSTREET, T.CONTEXTNAME CONTEXTNAME, TBO.searchfield searchfield, TBO.TBICODE TBICODE from core_kladrobj T left join core_kladrobj T2 on (substr(T.CODE, 1, 2) || '00000000000' = T2.CODE) left join core_kladrsocr T6 on (T2.SHORTNAME = T6.SHORTNAME) and (T6.OBJLEVEL=1) left join core_kladrobj T3 on (substr(T.CODE, 1, 5) || '00000000' = T3.CODE) left join core_kladrsocr T7 on (T3.SHORTNAME = T7.SHORTNAME) and (T7.OBJLEVEL=2) left join core_kladrobj T4 on (substr(T.CODE, 1, 8) || '00000' = T4.CODE) left join core_kladrsocr T8 on (T4.SHORTNAME = T8.SHORTNAME) and (T8.OBJLEVEL=3) left join core_kladrobj T5 on (substr(T.CODE, 1, 11) || '00' = T5.CODE) left join core_kladrsocr T9 on (T5.SHORTNAME = T9.SHORTNAME) and (T9.OBJLEVEL=4), (select SUBSTR(TBI.CODE, 1, 8) || '00000' as codebegin, SUBSTR(TBI.CODE, 1, 8) || '99900' as codeend, UPPER(TBI.FULLNAME || ' ' || TBI.SHORTNAME) as searchfield, TBI.CODE as TBICODE from core_kladrobj TBI where((TBI.CODE like '77%') or (TBI.CODE like '78%') or (TBI.CODE like '99%') or (TBI.CODE like '92%') or (substr(TBI.CODE, 6, 3) <> '000') or (substr(TBI.CODE, 9, 3) <> '000')) and (substr(TBI.CODE, 12, 2) = '00') #chunk($NAME) and (UPPER(TBI.FULLNAME || ' ' || TBI.SHORTNAME) like UPPER(#bind($NAME 'VARCHAR') || '%')) #end #chunk($CODE) and (TBI.CODE= #bind($CODE 'VARCHAR')) #end #chunk($KLADROBJID) and (TBI.KLADROBJID= #bind($KLADROBJID 'NUMERIC')) #end #chunk($POSTALCODE) and (TBI.POSTALCODE= #bind($POSTALCODE 'VARCHAR')) #end #chunk($REGIONCODE) and (TBI.CODE like UPPER(#bind($REGIONCODE 'VARCHAR'))) #end ) TBO where (((T.code >= TBO.codebegin) AND (T.code <= TBO.codeend) and (SUBSTR(TBO.TBICODE, 9, 3) = '000')) or (T.code = TBO.TBICODE)) AND (SUBSTR(T.CODE, 12, 2) = '00') #chunk($REGIONNAME) and (UPPER(T2.FULLNAME + ' ' + T2.SHORTNAME) like UPPER(#bind($REGIONNAME 'VARCHAR') + '%')) #end #chunk($ZONENAME) and (UPPER(T3.FULLNAME + ' ' + T3.SHORTNAME) like UPPER(#bind($ZONENAME 'VARCHAR') + '%')) #end #chunk($CITYNAME) and (UPPER(T4.FULLNAME + ' ' + T4.SHORTNAME) like UPPER(#bind($CITYNAME 'VARCHAR') + '%')) #end #chunk($PLACENAME) and (UPPER(T5.FULLNAME + ' ' + T5.SHORTNAME) like UPPER(#bind($PLACENAME 'VARCHAR') + '%')) #end

select T.KLADROBJID KLADROBJID, T2.CODE REGIONCODE, T2.FULLNAME REGIONNAME, T2.FULLNAME + ' ' + T2.SHORTNAME REGIONFULLNAME, T2.SHORTNAME REGIONTYPE, T6.TYPECODE REGIONTYPECODE, (case when SubString(T3.CODE, 3, 3) = '000' then null else T3.CODE end) ZONECODE, (case when SubString(T3.CODE, 3, 3) = '000' then null else T3.FULLNAME end) ZONENAME, (case when SubString(T3.CODE, 3, 3) = '000' then null else T3.FULLNAME + ' ' + T3.SHORTNAME end) ZONEFULLNAME, T3.SHORTNAME ZONETYPE, T7.TYPECODE ZONETYPECODE, (case when SubString(T4.CODE, 6, 3) = '000' then null else T4.CODE end) CITYCODE, (case when SubString(T4.CODE, 6, 3) = '000' then null else T4.FULLNAME end) CITYNAME, (case when SubString(T4.CODE, 6, 3) = '000' then null else T4.FULLNAME + ' ' + T4.SHORTNAME end) CITYFULLNAME, T4.SHORTNAME CITYTYPE, T8.TYPECODE CITYTYPECODE, (case when SubString(T5.CODE, 9, 3) = '000' then null else T5.CODE end) PLACECODE, (case when SubString(T5.CODE, 9, 3) = '000' then null else T5.FULLNAME end) PLACENAME, (case when SubString(T5.CODE, 9, 3) = '000' then null else T5.FULLNAME + ' ' + T5.SHORTNAME end) PLACEFULLNAME, T5.SHORTNAME PLACETYPE, T9.TYPECODE PLACETYPECODE, T.CODE, T.FULLNAME NAME, T.FULLNAME + ' ' + T.SHORTNAME FULLNAME, T.SHORTNAME TYPE, T.ISFEDERALCITY ISFEDERALCITY, T.ISNOSTREET ISNOSTREET, T.CONTEXTNAME CONTEXTNAME from core_kladrobj T left join core_kladrobj T2 on (SubString(T.CODE, 1, 2) + '00000000000' = T2.CODE) left join core_kladrsocr T6 on (T2.SHORTNAME = T6.SHORTNAME) and (T6.OBJLEVEL=1) left join core_kladrobj T3 on (SubString(T.CODE, 1, 5) + '00000000' = T3.CODE) left join core_kladrsocr T7 on (T3.SHORTNAME = T7.SHORTNAME) and (T7.OBJLEVEL=2) left join core_kladrobj T4 on (SubString(T.CODE, 1, 8) + '00000' = T4.CODE) left join core_kladrsocr T8 on (T4.SHORTNAME = T8.SHORTNAME) and (T8.OBJLEVEL=3) left join core_kladrobj T5 on (SubString(T.CODE, 1, 11) + '00' = T5.CODE) left join core_kladrsocr T9 on (T5.SHORTNAME = T9.SHORTNAME) and (T9.OBJLEVEL=4) where ((T.CODE like '77%') or (T.CODE like '78%') or (T.CODE like '99%') or (T.CODE like '92%') or (SubString(T.CODE, 6, 3) <> '000') or (SubString(T.CODE, 9, 3) <> '000')) and (SubString(T.CODE, 12, 2) = '00') #chunk($NAME) and (UPPER(T.FULLNAME + ' ' + T.SHORTNAME) like UPPER(#bind($NAME 'VARCHAR') + '%')) #end #chunk($REGIONNAME) and (UPPER(T2.FULLNAME + ' ' + T2.SHORTNAME) like UPPER(#bind($REGIONNAME 'VARCHAR') + '%')) #end #chunk($ZONENAME) and (UPPER(T3.FULLNAME + ' ' + T3.SHORTNAME) like UPPER(#bind($ZONENAME 'VARCHAR') + '%')) #end #chunk($CITYNAME) and (UPPER(T4.FULLNAME + ' ' + T4.SHORTNAME) like UPPER(#bind($CITYNAME 'VARCHAR') + '%')) #end #chunk($PLACENAME) and (UPPER(T5.FULLNAME + ' ' + T5.SHORTNAME) like UPPER(#bind($PLACENAME 'VARCHAR') + '%')) #end #chunk($CODE) and (T.CODE= #bind($CODE 'VARCHAR')) #end #chunk($KLADROBJID) and (T.KLADROBJID= #bind($KLADROBJID 'NUMERIC')) #end #chunk($POSTALCODE) and (T.POSTALCODE= #bind($POSTALCODE 'VARCHAR')) #end #chunk($REGIONCODE) and (T.CODE like UPPER(#bind($REGIONCODE 'VARCHAR'))) #end

query.name: dsKladrBrowseListByParamCount
query.sql: select #result('count(T.KLADROBJID)', 'java.lang.Long', 'CNT') from core_kladrobj T left join core_kladrobj T2 on (substr(T.CODE, 1, 2) || '00000000000' = T2.CODE) left join core_kladrobj T3 on (substr(T.CODE, 1, 5) || '00000000' = T3.CODE) left join core_kladrobj T4 on (substr(T.CODE, 1, 8) || '00000' = T4.CODE) left join core_kladrobj T5 on (substr(T.CODE, 1, 11) || '00' = T5.CODE) where ((T.CODE like '77%') or (T.CODE like '78%') or (T.CODE like '99%') or (T.CODE like '92%') or (substr(T.CODE, 6, 3) <> '000') or (substr(T.CODE, 9, 3) <> '000')) and (substr(T.CODE, 12, 2) = '00') #chunk($NAME) and (UPPER(T.FULLNAME || ' ' || T.SHORTNAME) like UPPER(#bind($NAME 'VARCHAR') || '%')) #end #chunk($REGIONNAME) and (UPPER(T2.FULLNAME || ' ' || T2.SHORTNAME) like UPPER(#bind($REGIONNAME 'VARCHAR') || '%')) #end #chunk($ZONENAME) and (UPPER(T3.FULLNAME || ' ' || T3.SHORTNAME) like UPPER(#bind($ZONENAME 'VARCHAR') || '%')) #end #chunk($CITYNAME) and (UPPER(T4.FULLNAME || ' ' || T4.SHORTNAME) like UPPER(#bind($CITYNAME 'VARCHAR') || '%')) #end #chunk($PLACENAME) and (UPPER(T5.FULLNAME || ' ' || T5.SHORTNAME) like UPPER(#bind($PLACENAME 'VARCHAR') || '%')) #end #chunk($CODE) and (T.CODE= #bind($CODE 'VARCHAR')) #end #chunk($KLADROBJID) and (T.KLADROBJID= #bind($KLADROBJID 'NUMERIC')) #end #chunk($POSTALCODE) and (T.POSTALCODE= #bind($POSTALCODE 'VARCHAR')) #end #chunk($REGIONCODE) and (T.CODE like UPPER(#bind($REGIONCODE 'VARCHAR'))) #end

select #result('count(T.KLADROBJID)', 'java.lang.Long', 'CNT') from core_kladrobj T left join core_kladrobj T2 on (SubString(T.CODE, 1, 2) + '00000000000' = T2.CODE) left join core_kladrobj T3 on (SubString(T.CODE, 1, 5) + '00000000' = T3.CODE) left join core_kladrobj T4 on (SubString(T.CODE, 1, 8) + '00000' = T4.CODE) left join core_kladrobj T5 on (SubString(T.CODE, 1, 11) + '00' = T5.CODE) where ((T.CODE like '77%') or (T.CODE like '78%') or (T.CODE like '99%') or (T.CODE like '92%') or (SubString(T.CODE, 6, 3) <> '000') or (SubString(T.CODE, 9, 3) <> '000')) and (SubString(T.CODE, 12, 2) = '00') #chunk($NAME) and (UPPER(T.FULLNAME + ' ' + T.SHORTNAME) like UPPER(#bind($NAME 'VARCHAR') + '%')) #end #chunk($REGIONNAME) and (UPPER(T2.FULLNAME + ' ' + T2.SHORTNAME) like UPPER(#bind($REGIONNAME 'VARCHAR') + '%')) #end #chunk($ZONENAME) and (UPPER(T3.FULLNAME + ' ' + T3.SHORTNAME) like UPPER(#bind($ZONENAME 'VARCHAR') + '%')) #end #chunk($CITYNAME) and (UPPER(T4.FULLNAME + ' ' + T4.SHORTNAME) like UPPER(#bind($CITYNAME 'VARCHAR') + '%')) #end #chunk($PLACENAME) and (UPPER(T5.FULLNAME + ' ' + T5.SHORTNAME) like UPPER(#bind($PLACENAME 'VARCHAR') + '%')) #end #chunk($CODE) and (T.CODE= #bind($CODE 'VARCHAR')) #end #chunk($KLADROBJID) and (T.KLADROBJID= #bind($KLADROBJID 'NUMERIC')) #end #chunk($POSTALCODE) and (T.POSTALCODE= #bind($POSTALCODE 'VARCHAR')) #end #chunk($REGIONCODE) and (T.CODE like UPPER(#bind($REGIONCODE 'VARCHAR'))) #end

query.name: dsKladrRegionBrowseListByParam
query.sql: select T.KLADROBJID, T.CODE, T.FULLNAME NAME, T.FULLNAME || ' ' || T.SHORTNAME FULLNAME, T.SHORTNAME TYPE, T.ISFEDERALCITY ISFEDERALCITY, T.ISNOSTREET ISNOSTREET, T.CONTEXTNAME CONTEXTNAME from core_kladrobj T where (T.CODE like '__00000000000') #chunk($NAME) and (UPPER(T.FULLNAME || ' ' || T.SHORTNAME) like UPPER(#bind($NAME 'VARCHAR') || '%')) #end #chunk($CODE) and (T.CODE= #bind($CODE 'VARCHAR')) #end #chunk($KLADROBJID) and (T.KLADROBJID= #bind($KLADROBJID 'NUMERIC')) #end order by 4

select T.KLADROBJID, T.CODE, T.FULLNAME NAME, T.FULLNAME + ' ' + T.SHORTNAME FULLNAME, T.SHORTNAME TYPE, T.ISFEDERALCITY ISFEDERALCITY, T.ISNOSTREET ISNOSTREET, T.CONTEXTNAME CONTEXTNAME from core_kladrobj T where (T.CODE like '__00000000000') #chunk($NAME) and (UPPER(T.FULLNAME + ' ' + T.SHORTNAME) like UPPER(#bind($NAME 'VARCHAR') + '%')) #end #chunk($CODE) and (T.CODE= #bind($CODE 'VARCHAR')) #end #chunk($KLADROBJID) and (T.KLADROBJID= #bind($KLADROBJID 'NUMERIC')) #end order by 4

query.name: dsKladrRegionBrowseListByParamCount
query.sql: select #result('count(T.KLADROBJID)', 'java.lang.Long', 'CNT') from core_kladrobj T where (T.CODE like '__00000000000') #chunk($NAME) and (UPPER(T.FULLNAME || ' ' || T.SHORTNAME) like UPPER(#bind($NAME 'VARCHAR') || '%')) #end #chunk($CODE) and (T.CODE= #bind($CODE 'VARCHAR')) #end #chunk($KLADROBJID) and (T.KLADROBJID= #bind($KLADROBJID 'NUMERIC')) #end

select #result('count(T.KLADROBJID)', 'java.lang.Long', 'CNT') from core_kladrobj T where (T.CODE like '__00000000000') #chunk($NAME) and (UPPER(T.FULLNAME + ' ' + T.SHORTNAME) like UPPER(#bind($NAME 'VARCHAR') + '%')) #end #chunk($CODE) and (T.CODE= #bind($CODE 'VARCHAR')) #end #chunk($KLADROBJID) and (T.KLADROBJID= #bind($KLADROBJID 'NUMERIC')) #end

query.name: dsKladrStreetBrowseListByParam
query.sql: select T.KLADRSTREETID, T.CODE, T.FULLNAME NAME, T.FULLNAME || ' ' || T.SHORTNAME FULLNAME, T.SHORTNAME TYPE, T.POSTALCODE POSTALCODE, T2.TYPECODE TYPECODE, T2.FULLNAME TYPEFULLNAME from core_kladrstreet T inner join core_kladrsocr T2 on (T.shortname=T2.shortname and t2.objlevel = 5) #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($NAME) (UPPER(T.FULLNAME || ' ' || T.SHORTNAME) like UPPER(#bind($NAME 'VARCHAR') || '%')) #end #chunk($CODE) (T.CODE= #bind($CODE 'VARCHAR')) #end #chunk($KLADRCODE) (T.CODE like #bind($KLADRCODE 'VARCHAR') || '%') #end #chunk($KLADRSTREETID) (T.KLADRSTREETID= #bind($KLADRSTREETID 'NUMERIC')) #end #end

select T.KLADRSTREETID, T.CODE, T.FULLNAME NAME, T.FULLNAME + ' ' + T.SHORTNAME FULLNAME, T.SHORTNAME TYPE, T.POSTALCODE POSTALCODE, T2.TYPECODE TYPECODE, T2.FULLNAME TYPEFULLNAME from core_kladrstreet T inner join core_kladrsocr T2 on (T.shortname=T2.shortname) #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($NAME) (UPPER(T.FULLNAME + ' ' + T.SHORTNAME) like UPPER(#bind($NAME 'VARCHAR') + '%')) #end #chunk($CODE) (T.CODE= #bind($CODE 'VARCHAR')) #end #chunk($KLADRCODE) (T.CODE like #bind($KLADRCODE 'VARCHAR') + '%') #end #chunk($KLADRSTREETID) (T.KLADRSTREETID = #bind($KLADRSTREETID 'NUMERIC')) #end #end

query.name: dsKladrStreetBrowseListByParamCount
query.sql: select #result('count(T.KLADRSTREETID)', 'java.lang.Long', 'CNT') from core_kladrstreet T inner join core_kladrsocr T2 on (T.shortname=T2.shortname) #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($NAME) (UPPER(T.FULLNAME || ' ' || T.SHORTNAME) like UPPER(#bind($NAME 'VARCHAR') || '%')) #end #chunk($CODE) (T.CODE= #bind($CODE 'VARCHAR')) #end #chunk($KLADRCODE) (T.CODE like #bind($KLADRCODE 'VARCHAR') || '%') #end #chunk($KLADRSTREETID) (T.KLADRSTREETID = #bind($KLADRSTREETID 'NUMERIC')) #end #end

select #result('count(T.KLADRSTREETID)', 'java.lang.Long', 'CNT') from core_kladrstreet T inner join core_kladrsocr T2 on (T.shortname=T2.shortname) #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($NAME) (UPPER(T.FULLNAME + ' ' + T.SHORTNAME) like UPPER(#bind($NAME 'VARCHAR') + '%')) #end #chunk($CODE) (T.CODE= #bind($CODE 'VARCHAR')) #end #chunk($KLADRCODE) (T.CODE like #bind($KLADRCODE 'VARCHAR') + '%') #end #chunk($KLADRSTREETID) (T.KLADRSTREETID= #bind($KLADRSTREETID 'NUMERIC')) #end #end

query.name: dsKladrHouseBrowseListByParam
query.sql: select * from ( select T.KLADRHOUSEID, T.CODE, T.HOUSENUMBER, T.POSTALCODE POSTALCODE from core_kladrhouse T #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($CODE) (T.CODE= #bind($CODE 'VARCHAR')) #end #chunk($KLADRCODE) (T.CODE like #bind($KLADRCODE 'VARCHAR') || '%') #end #chunk($KLADRHOUSEID) (T.KLADRHOUSEID= #bind($KLADRSTREETID 'NUMERIC')) #end #end ) where rownum <= 10

select top 10 T.KLADRHOUSEID, T.CODE, T.HOUSENUMBER, T.POSTALCODE POSTALCODE from core_kladrhouse T #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($CODE) (T.CODE= #bind($CODE 'VARCHAR')) #end #chunk($KLADRCODE) (T.CODE like #bind($KLADRCODE 'VARCHAR') + '%') #end #chunk($KLADRSTREETID) (T.KLADRSTREETID = #bind($KLADRSTREETID 'NUMERIC')) #end #end

query.name: dsKladrFindByCodeOrName
query.sql: SELECT t1.CODE as CODE, t1.FULLNAME as NAME, t1.SHORTNAME as TYPE, t2.FULLNAME as TYPENAME, t2.TYPECODE as TYPECODE FROM CORE_KLADROBJ t1 Left JOIN CORE_KLADRSOCR t2 on (t2.SHORTNAME = t1.SHORTNAME) and (t2.OBJLEVEL='$LEVEL') #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($CODE) t1.CODE LIKE (#bind($CODE 'VARCHAR') || '%') #end #chunk($FULLNAME) t1.FULLNAME = #bind($FULLNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #chunk($SHORTNAME) t1.SHORTNAME = #bind($SHORTNAME 'VARCHAR') #end #end

query.name: dsGetKladrByCode
query.sql: SELECT t1.CODE, t1.FULLNAME as NAME, t1.SHORTNAME as TYPE, t2.FULLNAME as TYPENAME, t2.TYPECODE as TYPECODE FROM CORE_KLADROBJ t1 Left JOIN CORE_KLADRSOCR t2 on (t2.SHORTNAME = t1.SHORTNAME) and (t2.OBJLEVEL='$LEVEL') WHERE CODE = '$CODE'
